<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>In Concert - MTV Plugged | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Contrary to the name of this long-running MTV series, Springsteen performed one song on acoustic guitar and the rest completely electric with his ‘92-era, post-E Street Band." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/in-concertmtv-plugged-2/" />

<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="In Concert - MTV Plugged" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Contrary to the name of this long-running MTV series, Springsteen performed one song on acoustic guitar and the rest completely electric with his ‘92-era, post-E Street Band. It features the first appearance of “Red Headed Woman” and the first recorded appearance of “Light of Day.” The record was released in Europe first to coincide with a live tour." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/in-concertmtv-plugged-2/" />

It features the first appearance of “Red Headed Woman” and the first recorded appearance of “Light of Day.” The record was released in Europe first to coincide with a live tour." />

yoast_head_json.title: In Concert - MTV Plugged | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Contrary to the name of this long-running MTV series, Springsteen performed one song on acoustic guitar and the rest completely electric with his ‘92-era, post-E Street Band.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Contrary to the name of this long-running MTV series, Springsteen performed one song on acoustic guitar and the rest completely electric with his ‘92-era, post-E Street Band. It features the first appearance of “Red Headed Woman” and the first recorded appearance of “Light of Day.” The record was released in Europe first to coincide with a live tour.

It features the first appearance of “Red Headed Woman” and the first recorded appearance of “Light of Day.” The record was released in Europe first to coincide with a live tour.
